attributes.action: allow the British Public to vote for their Prime Minister in an election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the United Kingdom, the British Public don't have the right to vote for candidates for the job of Prime Minister. The British Public only have the right to vote for their local MP and local councilors. This is the 21st century and the United Kingdom is supposed to be a democracy. Until the British Public have the right to vote on who is to be Prime Minister, the United Kingdom can never be a true democracy.
